mapper.insert: insert into order (petId, quantity, shipDate, status, complete) values (#{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order set petId = #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipDate = #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete = #{complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, petId, quantity, shipDate, status, complete from order
